name: Deleted token can not be used to post

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)
customFields.Update notes:
Steve Mudie — Wednesday, February 03, 2021 4:09 PM
• Dropped fromDesktop and Cloud manual testing - Cypress working as expected

inline.description:
1. Create or locate a bot that you have a valid token
2. Tests that the BOT can successfully post to a channel without issue (see test data)
3. Delete the token being used
4. Attempt the same post again
inline.testData: curl -i -X POST -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"channel_id":"<ChannelID>", "message":"This is a message from a bot", "props":{"attachments": [{"pretext": "Look some text","text": "This is text"}]}}' -H 'Authorization: Bearer <Auth Token of creator>' https://<serveraddress>/api/v4/posts
